colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD @013A *, ,KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, ^ GAL RKYEN GYI TSUL STOD SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKANGS DANG, BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SPYOD PA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I ^ TSUB LHONGS KYIS BSKYED PA'I NANG GDON SHIN TU MANG PA DANG, LHAG PAR LO SNGA PHYIR NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG BA MCHOD CING, ,MI SHEL BA'I LHA MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA 'KHU LDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKONGS BSHAMS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR BA BZHIN, LAG LEN BSTAR SKABS, ,^ BTZUN GZUGS @013A *, ,DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSOGS PHRAD CUNG ZAD BGSYUR CING, ,LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, DBEN NA BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU LAG CHOS CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, ,'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
